description.narrative: Output 5.6 Communication, Advocacy And Partnerships,which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid), Private Sector Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 2.1.5. Strengthening linkages between ECD and ADAP

mailing-address.narrative: Plot 9 George Street PO Box 7047 Kampala

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents
